service.name: thesaurus
service.documentation: Get list of all available thesaurus.

service.name: keywords
service.documentation:
Search for keywords
Parameters are: * pNewSearch=true * pTypeSearch=1 * pThesauri=external.place.regions * pMode=searchBox * maxResults=50 * pKeyword=*

service.name: thesaurus.remove
service.documentation:
Remove a thesaurus.
Parameters are: * ref=local.theme.da

service.name: thesaurus.enable
service.documentation:
Enable a thesaurus or not. If disabled, it will not be proposed in metadata editor.
Parameters are: * ref: The thesaurus identifier * activated: y or n

service.name: thesaurus.keyword
service.documentation:
Return one keyword.
Parameters are: * transformation: Name of the template to use to return the keyword (eg. to-iso19139-with-anchor). * keywordOnly: Skip thesaurus citation section if defined (default no).

service.name: thesaurus.keyword.links
service.documentation:
Get related/narrower/broader terms for a keyword.
Parameters are: * request: Type of relation (narrower, broader or related) * id: Concept identifier (eg. http://www.eionet.europa.eu/gemet/concept/5510) * thesaurus: Thesaurus identifier (eg. external.theme.gemet)

service.name: thesaurus.keyword.add
service.documentation:
Add a new keyword in a thesaurus.
Parameters are: ``` <request> <newid>http://www.mysite.org/thesaurus#1377682893112</newid> <refType>theme</refType> <definition>Definition</definition> <namespace>http://www.mysite.org/thesaurus</namespace> <ref>local.theme.da</ref><oldid/> <lang>eng</lang> <prefLab>Label</prefLab> </request> ```

service.name: thesaurus.keyword.remove
service.documentation: Remove one or more concepts from a thesaurus
